* Ramzi disqualified for using drugs (CERA) according to IOC press release of 18. November 2009. Reallocation of medals in January 2011. 




Men's 1500 m - Athletics - Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     Athletes competed in preliminary heats, semifinals and final. The best athletes from each heat (Q) and a number of "lucky losers" (q) advanced to the next level. The winner of the final was the Gold Medal winner. Event facts: Men's 1500 m competition was held at the Beijing National Stadium and 48 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Men's 1500 m - Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
